column10: Presence: Somehow I felt that the virtual world surrounded me.
column11: Presence: I felt like I was just perceiving pictures.
column12: Presence: I was completely captivated by the virtual world.
column13: Presence: The virtual world seemed more realistic than the real world.
column14: Presence: I still paid attention to the real environment.
column15: Presence: I felt present in the virtual space.
column16: Presence: I was not aware of my real environment.
column17: Presence: I had a sense of acting in the virtual space, rather than operating something from outside.
column18: Presence2: In the computer generated world I had a sense of "being there".
column19: Presence 3: I did not feel present in the virtual space.
column20: Presence 4: How real did the virtual world seem to you?
column21: Presence 5: How much did your experience in the virtual environment seem consistent with your real world experience ?
column22: Presence 6: How real did the virtual world seem to you?
column23: Presence 7: How aware were you of the real world surrounding while navigating in the virtual world? (i.e. sounds, room temperature, other people, etc.)?
